LanguageData.Chemical_ARA_Pheromone.label: Pheromone Dependency
LanguageData.Chemical_ARA_Pheromone.description: This person's body has become accustomed to the presence of external pheromones due to long-term use of the Arachne Pheromone Solution. If use is discontinued, the internal pseudonematodes will lose suppression and react violently.
